function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global threat from respiratory viruses such as SARS, SARS-CoV-2, influenza, and tuberculosis (TB).","Impact":"Pandemic spread and potential loss of human lives.","Mitigation":"Developing vaccines and medical treatments, implementing non-pharmaceutical interventions (NPIs), and conducting global public health campaigns.","Technologies":"Vaccine development, medical treatments, NPI guidelines, public health communication tools.","People":"Global population, especially those at higher risk of severe illness from respiratory viruses.","Owner":"Public health organizations, government agencies, pharmaceutical companies."},{"Description":"Potential psychological burdens and societal harms from harsh NPIs and lockdowns.","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health, community well-being, and economic stability.","Mitigation":"Researching and implementing alternative interventions that reduce virus transmission without severe interference in people's lives.","Technologies":"Digital health tools, community engagement platforms, remote work solutions.","People":"Affected populations, mental health professionals, community leaders, policymakers.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies, community organizations."},{"Description":"Quarantine failures leading to indoor infection in existing buildings.","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread and community transmission from quarantine facilities.","Mitigation":"Implementing stricter quarantine protocols, improving ventilation systems, and enhancing infection control measures in existing buildings.","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purification technologies, contact tracing apps, quarantine monitoring technologies.","People":"Quarantine facility staff, public health authorities, building owners, occupants of existing buildings.","Owner":"Public health agencies, building management companies, technology developers."}]}
